channel.title: Runserver.Bat Problem (Lol Got Compile.bat To Work) Plz Help
channel.description:
Hi, I wanted to knoe why does it say: 'java' is not reconized as an externat cmd...i made Compiler work..but this..idk,. help plz[br][size=1]Posted on: June 24, 2007, 11:38:22 AM[/size][hr]Lol plz help =(
[size=15pt]If Any1 Has A WORKING Client I Would Like The Link Please..And Can You Make Sure It Shall Work Wit JDK6u1[/size]

omfg!!! I LOVE U BAKATOOL UR DA SHIT!(COMPLENEMTN!!) OMFG!!! I LOVE U!![br][size=1]Posted on: June 24, 2007, 04:44:17 PM[/size][hr]wait on hellz it say they have pc how i get to tht?

item.title: Runserver.Bat Problem (Lol Got Compile.bat To Work) Plz Help
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

your compile code is…

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac” *.java

so your run code would be the same expect not javac but java…

Runserver.bar Code:@ECHO OFF
TITLE Client
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java” -Xmx500m EGUI
PAUSE [MESSED UP]

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver.Bat Problem (Lol Got Compile.bat To Work) Plz Help
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

Hmmmm, try adding this.

@echo off title SERVER NAME HERE java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

EDIT: Add that to your runserver.bat, sorry.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 24, 2007, 04:27:50 PM[/size][hr]WAIT! Is that for your client or your server???

item.title: Runserver.Bat Problem (Lol Got Compile.bat To Work) Plz Help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

wut code? and go on msn…better to talk[br][size=1]Posted on: June 24, 2007, 04:14:07 PM[/size][hr]Compiler Code:@echo off
color 0c
title Client Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac” *.java
pause [WORKS]

Runserver.bar Code:@ECHO OFF
TITLE Client
JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI
PAUSE [MESSED UP]

So What I Need TO Change In Runserver?
